name: Endways
description:
i am making this game inspired by the theme of dream emulator that is basically our own dreams, i will put in this project many dreams and places ive seen when i was sleeping and wanted to share, some of these places will gain their own games out of the dream-related genre... but will be showcased here aswell since my main source of inspiration are my dreams.

the graphics of the game might look a bit of a mix of lsd dream emulator with shadow of the colossus since SOTC is a game that used to constantly show up in my dreams.

if you can please donate when downloading, once i hit $60 i will finally get a 8gb of ram stick.. unhappily the notebook just have 1 ram slot so i will have to give my 4gb to my uncle... but 8 better than 4 at least!
